thread.title: Oakland councilwoman focuses on police exam to broaden diversity
thread.title_full: Oakland councilwoman focuses on police exam to broaden diversity - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rachel Swan
title: Oakland councilwoman focuses on police exam to broaden diversity
text:
Photo: Michael Short, Special To The Chronicle Council chairperson Desley Brooks listens to public comments during an Oakland City Council public city committee meeting at City Hall in Oakland on Friday, October 16, 2015. Council chairperson Desley Brooks listens to public comments during...
An Oakland City Council member who wants the Police Department to hire more African American officers has focused her attention on the written exam for new applicants — which is the point where many candidates get eliminated. Council chairperson Desley Brooks listens to public comments during an Oakland City Council public city committee meeting at City Hall in Oakland on Friday, October 16, 2015. An Oakland City Council member who wants the Police Department to hire more African American officers has focused her attention on the written exam for new applicants — which is the point where many candidates get eliminated.
